Class ScannerUtils

  • java.lang.Object

  • public class ScannerUtils
extends java.lang.Object
    This class offers utility methods for scanners.
    Author:
    Florian Deissenboeck, Elmar Juergens

    • Method Detail

      • readTokens

        public static void readTokens(IScanner scanner,
                              java.util.List<IToken> tokens,
                              java.util.List<ScannerException> exceptions)
                       throws java.io.IOException
        Read tokens from a strict scanner and store them in a list. This expects the scanner to return a token with type ETokenType.EOF at the end of the file. This last token will not be added to the list of tokens.
        Parameters:
        scanner - the scanner to read from
        tokens - the list to store tokens
        exceptions - another list to store possible exceptions that occurred during scanning.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - thrown if scanner throws an IO exception

      • readTokens

        public static java.util.List<IToken> readTokens(ILenientScanner scanner)
                                         throws java.io.IOException
        Read tokens from a lenient scanner and store them in a list. This expects the scanner to return a token with type ETokenType.EOF at the end of the file. This last token will not be added to the list of tokens.
        Parameters:
        scanner - the scanner to read from
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - thrown if scanner throws an IO exception

      • getTokens

        public static java.util.List<IToken> getTokens(java.lang.String content,
                                               ELanguage language)
        Returns the results of scanning a string. The origin of the tokens is set to some arbitrary value.

      • getTokens

        public static java.util.List<IToken> getTokens(java.lang.String content,
                                               ELanguage language,
                                               java.lang.String origin)
        Returns the results of scanning a string. The origin of the tokens is set to the given origin.
